Tweaks for http://kzradio.net
1. Clickable Playlist - As you probably know, when listening to an archived show you can click on the list button (at the bottom right) and overview the show playlist.
This extensions turns the songs names to clickable(!)
2. Download Shows - Adds download links for each show
